attributes.action: Wimbledon To Use The Roof They Spent £125m On!
attributes.additional_details:
The All England Lawn Tennis Club spent £125m on the roof for Centre Court but despite there being rain forecast throughout the week of the tournament, they decide not to use it!

In tough economic times, sporting events that spend huge amounts of money on technology should be made to use at the appropriate times to please sporting fans!

I urge all sports fans to sign this e-petition to make all the difference.
